text: enikk sesam etearu daivatteyan ninnal aradhikkuka ? enn ya'akhub maranam asannamaya sandarbhattil tanre santatikaleat ceadiccappeal ninnalavite sannihitarayirunnea ? avar parannu: tankalute aradhyanaya, tankalute pitakkalaya ibrahiminreyum isma'ilinreyum isakhinreyum aradhyanaya ekadaivatte matram nannal aradhikkum. nannal avann kil‌pett jivikkunnavarumayirikkum
